name: Nenneke
ability:
Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. 
Charges: 4
ability_html: Zeal. Order (Ranged): Boost a unit by 1. Charges: 4
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Few know more about healing than Nenneke.

name: Prince Stennis
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 4.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost 4 allied units by 1.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Boost an allied unit by 4. Deploy (Ranged): Boost 4 allied units by 1.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row.
flavor: He wears armor made of gold. Of course he's a jerk.

name: Anna Strenger
ability:
At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1. Inspired: Boost adjacent units by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Anna hated her husband so much that she was ready to do anything in order to be free of the man — and the child he had put inside her.

name: Blue Stripes Commando
ability: Order: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Order: Summon all copies of self from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: I'd do anything for Temeria. Mostly though, I kill for her.

name: Temerian Infantry
ability:
Formation.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 for each remaining Charge of your leader ability.
ability_html: Formation. Order: Boost an allied unit by 2 for each remaining Charge of your leader ability.
keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: Temeria! Temeria! Gods shed all grace on thee! And smite thy foes with horrid woes, for all eternity!

name: Ronvid the Incessant
ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 5.
When you play a Soldier, Summon self from your graveyard to a random allied row.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 5. When you play a Soldier, Summon self from your graveyard to a random allied row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: This self-dubbed knight roams the world defending the honor of his beloved Maid Bilberry - though none are certain where she lives, if she lives still or if she ever lived at all.

name: Reinforced Trebuchet
ability:
Ranged: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on the Ranged row by 1.
Crew: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
ability_html: Ranged: At the end of your turn, damage a random enemy unit on the Ranged row by 1. Crew: Damage a random enemy unit by 1 instead.
keyword_html: Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers.
flavor: Feel that? The earth trembles each time Big Bertha looses a stone.

name: Temerian Drummer
ability: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
ability_html: At the end of your turn, boost the unit to the right by 1.
flavor: Not the career he had in mind when he told mummy he wanted to be a musician.

name: Lyrian Arbalest
ability:
Order: Damage a unit by 1. 
Charge: 1
Whenever you play a card with an Order, gain 1 Charge .
ability_html: Order: Damage a unit by 1. Charge: 1 Whenever you play a card with an Order, gain 1 Charge .
keyword_html: Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Charge: The number of times an Order ability can be used. Only cards with Charge: X can gain additional Charges.
flavor: I can find the bull's-eye from a hundred paces! Perhaps not with my first shot, mind you...

name: Lyrian Landsknecht
ability:
Formation.
Order: Damage a unit by 1.
Inspired: Damage by 3 instead.
ability_html: Formation. Order: Damage a unit by 1. Inspired: Damage by 3 instead.
keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power.
flavor: Best not laugh at their silly-arse hats. Believe me.

name: Kerack City Guard
ability:
Veil.
Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row.
At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, boost self by 1.
ability_html: Veil. Order: Move an enemy unit to the other row. At the end of your turn, if the Order is not used, boost self by 1.
keyword_html: Veil: Status that prevents unit from gaining other statuses. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: Geralt thought there were no ugly women, but in the guardhouse of Kerack he felt compelled to revise this view.

name: Siege Support
ability:
Deploy (Melee): Reduce the Cooldown of an allied unit by 1.
Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1.
Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
ability_html: Deploy (Melee): Reduce the Cooldown of an allied unit by 1. Deploy (Ranged): Boost an allied unit by 1. Order: Give an allied unit Zeal.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Melee: This ability can only be used while on the melee row. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused. Ranged: This ability can only be used while on the ranged row. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield.
flavor: You gotta recalibrate the arm by five degrees.\nDo what by the what now?

name: Dun Banner
ability: Whenever Dun Banner receives a boost, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
ability_html: Whenever Dun Banner receives a boost, Summon all copies of it from your deck to this row.
keyword_html: Summon: Move automatically to the battlefield (not considered played).
flavor: Stay calm, everyone. And be alert. The true owners of those cloaks and beaver–skin caps might be elsewhere.

name: Tridam Infantry
ability: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
ability_html: Whenever this unit receives a boost, damage a random enemy unit by 1.
flavor: Soldiers loyal to the old baron of Tridam left the city with Falibor, thus becoming renegades wanted by the law.

name: Lyrian Scytheman
ability: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 1 for each boosted unit on this row.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Our folk they feed, and our foes they bleed.

name: Radovid's Royal Guards
ability:
Formation.
Order: Boost an allied unit by 2.
Inspired: Give it 2 Armor.
ability_html: Formation. Order: Boost an allied unit by 2. Inspired: Give it 2 Armor.
keyword_html: Formation: If played on the melee row, gain Zeal. If played on the ranged row, boost self by 1. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Inspired: Trigger this ability if this unit's current power is higher than its base power. Armor: Protects the unit from damage. This value doesn't count towards your score and/or the unit's power.
flavor: They'll do anything for their king. They know what he'll do to them if they refuse.

name: Ballista
ability:
Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. 
Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Damage an enemy unit by 1. Order: Damage an enemy unit by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield.
flavor: What crossbows want to be when they grow up.

name: Siege Tower
ability:
Zeal. Order: Gain Vitality (2).
Crew: Boost self by 2 instead.
Cooldown: 2
ability_html: Zeal. Order: Gain Vitality (2). Crew: Boost self by 2 instead. Cooldown: 2
keyword_html: Zeal: An Order ability can be used on the same turn the card is placed on the battlefield. Order: An ability triggered manually by the player. Cards with Order cannot be used for 1 turn after being placed on the battlefield. Vitality: Status that boosts this unit by 1 on its turn end. Note: Vitality turns can accumulate; 1 turn of Vitality cancels out 1 turn of Bleeding. Crew: Trigger this ability if this unit is between two Soldiers. Cooldown: The number of turns before an Order or Fee ability can be reused.
flavor: The latest rage in assaults on walled cities.

name: Field Medic
ability: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 2.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost adjacent units by 2.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played.
flavor: Stitch red to red, white to white, and everything will be all right.

name: Redanian Elite
ability:
Deploy: Boost self by 6.
Exposed: Reset own power.
ability_html: Deploy: Boost self by 6. Exposed: Reset own power.
keyword_html: Deploy: Trigger this ability when played. Exposed: Trigger this ability whenever the unit loses its Armor.
flavor: I'll die for Redania, I'll kill for Redania… I'll even eat worms for Redania!
